content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Mr. Müller. I am pleased to have you here. Indeed, we shall discuss the rental price of this delightful 25-square-meter apartment in Munich. How shall we proceed?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your hospitality, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can call home for the next few years, so I'm hoping we can find a fair price that suits both our needs. Would you be willing to consider a lower rate for the long term?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Mr. Müller, I am always open to discussing long-term arrangements. I understand the value of stability and would be willing to offer a reduced rate for a prolonged lease. How many years are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'd like to sign a lease for at least two years, with the possibility of extending if everything goes well. I'm a student, so I'm looking for a place that can be my home base while I complete my studies. Would you be able to provide a discount for such a long-term commitment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Absolutely, Mr. Müller. As a student, I understand the importance of a stable living environment. For a two-year lease, I would be willing to offer a discount of 150 Euro per month. This would bring the monthly rent to 1,000 Euro. Does this offer suit your needs?
name: Heinrich Heine
